LightningComponentBundle.description: A simple GDS footer that can be used at the bottom of a community page.

property.name: secondaryNavigationRequired
property.label: Enable Footer with Secondary Navigation
property.description: Check to display Secondary Navigation. If selected, the four following parameters must be completed in full.

property.name: sectionNames
property.label: Section Names
property.description: Specify required Section names, separated by semicolons, eg Section1;Section2.

property.name: navigationNames
property.label: Navigation Items
property.description: Specify Navigation Item names, separated by semicolons. Group by Section using a pipe symbol. eg for 3 items in 2 sections enter ItemName1;ItemName2|ItemName3

property.name: navigationLinks
property.label: Navigation URLs
property.description: Specify Navigation Item URLs, separated by semicolons (in the same order as the names are entered). Group by Section using a pipe symbol. eg for 3 items in 2 sections enter ItemURL1;ItemURL2|ItemURL3

property.name: columnTypes
property.label: Column Type
property.description: For each defined Section, specify single column (1) or two column (2) layout for the items in that Section, separated by semicolons, eg for two Sections, enter 1;1, 2;1, 1;2, or 2;2

property.name: crownLogoRequired
property.label: Enable footer with Coat of Arms
property.description: Check to display coat of arms image in footer.

property.name: metalinksRequired
property.label: Enable Footer with Links
property.description: Check to display links. If selected, the two following parameters must be completed in full.

property.name: metalinkNames
property.label: Link Names
property.description: Specify Link names, separated by semicolons, eg Privacy;Accessibility Statement

property.name: metalinkURL
property.label: Link URLs
property.description: Specify Link URLs, separated by semicolons (in the same order as the names are entered), eg Privacy page URL;Accessibility Statement page URL
